comment.body:
Sorry, my bad,

I had been on the General tab on the Stealth page so I had not in fact
toggled on *Block 3D Party Authorization Headers*.

With *Block 3D Party Authorization Headers *selected neither of the two
custom rules you sent me resolve the problem…

It’s the same as initially reported.


Message ID: ***@***.***>
>>
>

Desktop

Установите AdGuard Extra и разрешите обоим расширениям доступ к поисковым страницам в настройках браузера.

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)

comment.body:
> How did you resolve your issue?



> Did you modify AdGuard's advanced settings?

It was identified as a network filtering problem in some anti-virus software, and corresponding mitigation measures were taken.

However, it worked normally before this AdGuard version update, so it seems that something was modified with this program update and the crash occurred.
